seo.title_override: Boston Mattress Disposal Guide 2026: Curbside & Rules
seo.meta_desc_override: Boston residents, easily dispose of your old mattress! Curbside pickup is available, and there are no fines for proper disposal. Find all 2026 rules here.

hero_hook: Struggling with where and how to get rid of your old mattress in Boston?
neighborhoods: Back Bay,Beacon Hill,South End,North End,Seaport District,Fenway-Kenmore,Allston,Brighton,Dorchester,Roxbury,Jamaica Plain,Roslindale,West Roxbury,Hyde Park,Charlestown

curbside_rules.mattress_specific_rule: Curbside mattress pick-up is limited to 10 items per calendar year.
curbside_rules.placement_time: Place your item where trash is typically placed (curbside, public alley, or dumpster area) by 6 a.m. on the day of your appointment or after 5 ...
curbside_rules.the_catch: The City of Boston will not collect any mattress without an appointment.
curbside_rules.schedule_logic: schedule special item and mattress pickups via BOS:311 with limits for each program.

weather_profile.rejection_risk_copy: WARNING: Boston averages 100+ rainy days per year. If your mattress gets wet before pickup, the city WILL NOT take it (too heavy, mold risk). Our haulers pick up from inside your home — rain or shine.
